tha-ap86:0.3_0: Hermits to the senior monks, holding a corner,
tha-ap86:1.2_0: Sikhī, a disciple of the best.
tha-ap86:1.3_0: I am master of the three knowledges, mighty and powerful,
tha-ap86:1.4_0: the Himalayas, the king of mountains.
tha-ap86:2.1_0: I too am in the Himalayas,
tha-ap86:6.1_0: With the simile of the government official,
tha-ap86:7.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap86:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap86:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap86:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nārada.
